description: This table contains event dates information for Home Health episodes. This information can be entered manually in the Episode of Care Information form in Intake. For certain events, such as Admit, Discharge, and SOC, the information is triggered automatically.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DATE_OF_EVENT
columns.description: Date of event in the episode.

columns.name: DATE_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category list selection for event on this date.  Links to category table ZC_DATE_EVENT.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Intake Completed


Start of Care


Assessment 


Resumption of Care


Cert Period Start


Cert Period End


Episode Created


Coverage Change Start of Care


Alternative Billing Start Date for Cutover


MCCM Election


Notice of Admission Date for Cutover


Inpatient Discharge


Home Health Discharge


Demographic Update


Discard Episode


MCCM Discharge


Hospice Admission


Hospice Discharge


Hospice Non-Admit

columns.name: DATE_ENTERED_BY_ID
columns.description: ID of the user who entered the event.  Links to CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: EVENT_COMMENTS
columns.description: Comments text typed in by a user.

columns.name: EVENT_CREAT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the time and date when an event type was created for the first time for a Home Care episode.

columns.name: EVENT_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the time and date when an event type was last updated for a Home Care episode. If an event is not updated after being created then this item will contain the same value as Summary Block / Episode record (HSB) 27408.

columns.name: LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user who most recently edited the event in this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.
